SELECT /* codeQuery.displayCodeList */ IDX , CODE , CODE_DETAIL , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT FROM BG_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND PARENT_CODE = 'DIS'
SELECT /* codeQuery.paymentCodeList */ IDX , CODE , CODE_DETAIL , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT FROM BG_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND PARENT_CODE = 'PAY'
SELECT /* codeQuery.payProcessCodeList */ IDX , CODE , CODE_DETAIL , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT FROM BG_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND PARENT_CODE = 'PRO'
